meanings.definition: A type of Indian temple dancer.
meanings.sent1: The bayadere performed graceful movements during the traditional dance.
meanings.sent2: The bayadere captivated the audience with her elegant performance.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous monkey tried to imitate the bayadere's dance but failed comically.
meanings.sent4: Her movements were as mesmerizing as a bayadere's dance under the moonlight.
meanings.sent5: The colorful attire of the bayadere shimmered under the stage lights.

meanings.definition: A fabric with horizontal stripes in contrasting colors.
meanings.sent1: She sewed a beautiful dress using the vibrant bayadere fabric.
meanings.sent2: The bayadere pattern on the fabric added a unique touch to the design.
meanings.sent3: The curtains made of bayadere material gave the room a cheerful vibe.
meanings.sent4: The bayadere fabric reminded her of a rainbow stretched across the sky.
meanings.sent5: The bayadere stripes on the fabric created a striking visual effect.
